content: Unlike the Drinks in the game and the Gourd itself, Soaks can't be upgraded at the Shen Monkey Vendor, so you are stuck with the potency of this buff. It can't be increased. So, if you want to switch to a more powerful buff, be sure to head back to the Shen Monkey Vendor.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Celestial_Lotus_Seeds.md', within the main section titled 'Celestial Lotus Seeds'.
The content is as follows:
Unlike the Drinks in the game and the Gourd itself, Soaks can't be upgraded at the Shen Monkey Vendor, so you are stuck with the potency of this buff. It can't be increased. So, if you want to switch to a more powerful buff, be sure to head back to the Shen Monkey Vendor.
